text: The Riegelsberg Transmitter (or Schocksberg Transmitter) is a transmitter for FM and TV at Riegelsberg, near Saarbrücken, Germany. The transmitter uses as aerial a guyed mast. ==See also== * List of Masts ==External links== * * http://www.skyscraperpage.com/diagrams/?b46680 Category:Buildings and structures in Saarbrücken (district)
title: Transmitter Riegelsberg
